signIn.title: Sign In
signIn.description: Please sign in to access your account.

signUp.description:
Provide the requested information 
 to create an account.
forgotPassword.title: Forgot Password?
forgotPassword.description:
Instructions to recover / reset password will 
be sent to your email.
forgotPassword.instructions:
We have sent an email to you with instructions 
how to recover your password
ConfirmationCode.confirm.title: Check Your Email
ConfirmationCode.confirm.description: A confirmation code has been sent to your email.

twoFactorAuthentication.description:
Please check your 2FA Setup and 
enter the code below
kyc.title: KYC Required
kyc.description: To comply with KYC regulations and ensure user safety, please verify your personal information.
